info:
Here you can explore the exchange courses taken by previous students. 

You can see which universities they have attended, which countries they have visited, and which courses they have taken. 
Compare with others in your study and create your own plan.
noComments: The student has not added any comments for this course.
loginToFavorite: You need to be logged in to add or edit favorites
errorSavingFavorites: An error occurred while saving favorites. Please contact us if the problem persists.
search: Search for country, university, study program, or specialization
